"yoÄŸunlaÅŸÄ±yorum" implies deep specialization.
Suggested Revision (More Humble):

"Ben Alp Yalay. Ä°zmir Ekonomi Ãœniversitesi Ã‡eviribilim bÃ¶lÃ¼mÃ¼ mezunu, Ä°stanbul'da yaÅŸayan bir Ã§evirmenim. Why it works better:

It removes the word "expert" entirely.
"kendimi geliÅŸtiriyorum" means "I am developing/improving myself," which clearly signals you are in a growth phase.
"Ã¶zenle Ã§alÄ±ÅŸÄ±yorum" means "I work diligently/carefully," highlighting your work ethic rather than claiming a level of quality you're still building towards.
For the Tagline
Original Turkish Text:

"'Diller arasÄ±ndaki engelleri hassasiyet ve kÃ¼ltÃ¼rel anlayÄ±ÅŸla aÅŸÄ±yorum.'"

Suggested Revision:

(Translation: 'I aim to overcome the barriers between languages with sensitivity and cultural understanding.')

Why it works better:
Changing the phrase to a goal ("hedefliyorum") makes it sound like a professional principle you follow, rather than a definitive statement of your ability.

By making these small changes, your website will present you as a passionate and dedicated professional who is at the start of a promising career in game localization.
